channel.title: Maven on console.log('Hello World!');
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on console.log('Hello World!');

item.title: Set Proxy for Maven
item.description: Proxy settings can be changed in {{maven_installation_folder}}/conf/settings.xml. Un-comment and change the values in proxies section of the file. Changes to this file doesn’t require maven restart. ... <proxies> <!-- proxy | Specification for one proxy, to be used in connecting to the network. |--> <proxy> <id>optional</id> <active>true</active> <protocol>http</protocol> <username></username> <password></password> <host>{{proxy_host_or_ip}}</host> <port>8080</port> <nonProxyHosts>local.net|some.host.com</nonProxyHosts> </proxy> </proxies> ...
